channel.title: Pages on ComputerKid's Brain Dump
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on ComputerKid's Brain Dump

item.title: About This Blog
item.description: This isn’t actually a blog, really. There is no structure, or subject, though I’ll bet it’s going to revolve around tech. I like to think of this as a brain dump that the whole world can see. On the back end this blog is a static site. Made with Hugo and the bilberry theme. It was very fun and easy to make. It’s the first website I’ve made in the last 5 years-ish.

item.title: About Me
item.description: ComputerKid n : an incredible not-yet-adult; A fan of books, podcasts, writing, hiking, backpacking, camping, COFFEE, exploring, learning, Linux, open source, and of course Computers; A regular at Linux Unplugged Email: thatcomputerkid@pm.me Geekshed: ComputerKid Freenode: ComputerKid Discord: ComputerKid#6125 Github: ThatComputerKid Conferences I am visiting: Stupid Corona My current Tech Setup: One laptop with Arch Linux KDE Plasma I3wm(I plan to make an article on how I married these two) A Pine A64 single board computer running Arch Linux with Docker
